alert.note: Alert for Bell; Harlan; Letcher; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 4:30AM EST until January 03 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, with locally higher amounts on the highest mountain peaks. * WHERE...Bell, Harlan, Letcher and Pike Counties. * WHEN...through 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult early this morning, mainly for elevations above 1500 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will lead to reduced visibilities poor conditions on roadways early this morning. The heavy and wet nature of the snow could bring some trees or large limbs down in higher elevations, with some power outages possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Let others know when you are leaving and when you have reached your destination.
